commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We're back. We bought lunch for everyone.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You were gone for so long! I got so tired of waiting and now my stomach is eating itself.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'm so sorry! We bought a whole bunch of food, so eat up!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You didn't get lost, did you?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nijigasaki's a pretty big school. Maybe we should've gone instead.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We didn't get lost.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Then what took you so long?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We got held up because some fans called out to us and wanted to shake our hands.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It took that long to shake their hands?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You're implying that there was more than one person, right? How many people were you stopped by?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I don't know exactly how many, but maybe about 100?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hmm. Yeah, maybe? I'm really not sure.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Excellent! You two are so popular.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Grumble* Yeah, well you know what? I... I had people call out to me, too! Hmph!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow, that's impressive!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There were only 15 of them, but I talked to each and every one of them a whole bunch!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hehe. You seemed pretty happy about it, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Of course I was! Why wouldn't I be? They called me cute, after all!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: A crowd formed around us as well when Maki and I were lining up at the food stand. You sure do stand out, huh, Maki?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You make it sound like I was the only one surrounded by a crowd, but the same thing pretty much happened to you too.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I wouldn't say that!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I expected no less of my little demons. Your charismatic ways are second only to mine.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But you must be tired after all of that handshaking, right?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh? Actually, not really...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: They made the effort to come here, so I just want to make sure they enjoy themselves.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Bringing them joy by simply shaking their hands doesn't take much out of me.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: There you go again, Maki. You're just a ball of kindness.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm sure everyone thinks the same way. What about you, Rin?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'd shake their hands too! I might pull their arms off with how happy I am, though!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Try not to pull their arms off...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Anyway, let's eat. I'm starving after all of that action on stage!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Totally. Let's dig in.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Whoa... You said you bought a lot of food, but there's SO MUCH! Is it all gonna fit on the table?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I mean, everything looked so delicious! We just got a little carried away.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: These events aren't held every day, so I'd totally want to try out everything they offer!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I understand what you're saying, but this is TOO much. We're lined up to perform again after this, so we can't finish it all.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What's done is done. We can just doggy bag whatever's left over to take home.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hmm. The Stewshine sure does stand out. Even with all the other food on the table it still finds a way to grab your attention.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yes! I know, right? It's the ultimate food to captivate anyone who lays an eye on it!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: And just so you know, this is a Stewshine I've tweaked especially for the School Idol Festival. A Festival Stewshine!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh... If you're talking about food that will captivate all who see it, then look no further than my Dance of the Fallen Angel!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh! Chika's mikan-orange rice is delicious!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? Really?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yup! I could eat this forever! Just trust me on this and give it a try.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You better not be pulling a fast one on me. *Chomp* Mrph!?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Tasty, huh?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Really tasty! This is so good! I can't believe it. Shizuko, try some!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The color kinda scares me... *Munch*

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm sorry I doubted you, Kasumi! This is delicious!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Right?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hehe. I was pretty shocked at first as well.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Chuckle* Surprising to look at and surprisingly delicious, too.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Whoa, what is this?! Hang on, this dish tastes really good too!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Is that Kanata's hamburger-steak curry?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You're right! What in the heck? Why does it taste so good?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It doesn't look particularly fancy, but I keep going back for more!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It tastes like something made by someone who can really cook.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: The succulent flavors of the meat are filling my mouth... Oh gosh, I feel like it all just melts on my tongue.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Everything is delicious. I'm sure everyone who's come to this festival is enjoying themselves as well.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: They get to eat delicious food and then join in on all of the different live shows and events. Nothing could be better than this!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm happy I got the opportunity to participate in the School Idol Festival. I have no doubt that my experiences here will help me in the future.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It was a pretty bumpy road on the way here, but it looks like our hard work has paid off.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I agree. And we all know who worked the hardest out of all of us. We should be thankful for her.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's right! Our Prez always gives 110 percent!
